name: Ho-oh
author: Kazuyuki Kano
flavor_text: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.

poke_power.name: Phoenix Turn
poke_power.effect: Once during your opponent’s turn, if Ho-Oh would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, you may flip a coin. If heads, Ho-Oh isn’t discarded. Instead, remove all damage counters, Special Conditions, and other effects from Ho-Oh. Then, discard all cards attached to Ho-Oh (except for Energy cards). This counts as Ho-Oh being Knocked Out and your opponent takes a Prize card.

attacks.name: Rainbow Wing
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the number of different types of basic Energy cards attached to Ho-Oh.
